title: The Suvarna Kamal Haaram Set: A Radiant Symphony of Gold and Diamonds
materials: 18K Rose Gold and White Gold (approximately 35 grams)
featuring meticulously set Cubic Zirconia (CZ) diamonds. Features a high Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine and radiance.
features: Inspired by the lotus motif (Kamal) and geometric patterns, this Haaram set is a modern interpretation of classic South Indian designs. Features openwork settings for maximum light refraction and floral accents. The pendant showcases cascading geometric patterns, with the earrings echoing the design to create a harmonious ensemble.
colors: Rose Gold and White Gold create a harmonious contrast
complemented by the brilliant sparkle of the clear Cubic Zirconia.
occasions: and festive occasions. A statement piece that can elevate any outfit.
description: This stunning set combines contemporary design with South Indian influences. The meticulous setting of the stones creates a dazzling effect, while the rose gold and white gold combination adds a touch of sophistication. A perfect blend of tradition and modernity, making it a treasured addition to any jewelry collection. Hypoallergenic and durable, ensuring years of enjoyment.
